name: Trapnoid 2
description:
The good winter world lived its own fairy life owing to the chilling crystal, which prevented it from heating and dying. But the wicked sovereign of a hot hell decided to capture this world. He stole the magic crystal and now the winter world gets hot and perishes. Namely you must save the world from dying, defeat the Evil and return the crystal. You have the high jumps and a little magic at your disposal. Hurry up!Game features:
  • colourful dynamic levels
  • 40 secrets and easter eggs all along the game
  • the gamepad support
